summary: In 1944, during a sabotage mission, the sole surviving U.S. paratrooper is saved by a group of Italian orphans who later aid him in blowing-up a vital enemy dam.

keywords: year 1944|death of parents|saboteur|child fights an adult|child uses a gun
title: Nido de avispas
